comment: Incredibly nice and very helpful. She teaches the subject very well- she fully understands what she's talking about (because it's her native language, but still- can't say that all professors know what they're saying). Very fun class! And don't forget to do your homework!!!
Great professor and teacher. Very understanding and helpful. Makes learning the language easy and fun.
she is funny and very nice. she makes the class go by very quickly, but you do have to teach yourself alot of the material. studying outside of class is a fundamental part of her course

She's a hilarious teacher and makes the time pass quick. Self-teaching and studyng are pretty important when you have her. She glosses over vocab so unless you're studying on your own you'll get lost. Tests were easy and there are plenty of chances for extra credit. Besides the tests and final, 3 roleplays and one composition.

I love this teacher! Very fun to talk to about Germany/German, etc. I will admit, things can get a bit difficult if you can't keep up. I have some exposure to German so I am doing just fine. Tests are easy if you are prepared. Very funny teacher...definitely would take again.

Okay professor. Knows her stuff but can be kind of standoffish with students. Taught from online book, which got boring quickly, but discussions were lively and humorous. Tests were long and difficult. Really have to work for an A.

Doesn't answer questions, doesn't "have time" for anyone, ridiculous tests and ridiculous grading. Can't understand her thick accent (when she even decides to speak a wink of english) and expects the student to be fluent by the end.  DO NOT TAKE.

This class flies! By the second class we were already supposed to be able to introduce ourselves, ask for names, say colors, about 20 objects, and speak several sentences. VERY HARD, not sure if the department demands she goes so fast, but very hard to keep up with.

Class was fun and interesting. Test are harder because they are pre-made by the dept head. Mrs. Boettcher tries very hard to answer questions and make the work understandable. Just go to class, pay attention, and ask questions.
